text.text_translated:
Gabriela saw her team had a different way of working. So she had a talk with them. She asked how they felt about her as a boss.
The team was happy she asked. They told her what they really thought. They did not like it when someone told them what to do. They liked to start things themselves. They also liked to have new ideas.
When Gabriela told them exactly what to do, they felt bad. They thought she did not believe they could do their job well. The team saw Gabriela was unhappy when they disagreed with her. They explained that this was their normal way to work.
